# Charm Animal (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Charm Spells|charm]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One animal

**Duration:** 1 day/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 254

This spell functions like *[[Charm Person (Spell)|charm person]]*, except that the effect is not restricted by creature type or size.
